p: DPPH scavenging activity. There was a dose-dependent increase in percentage inhibitory activity of the extracts and standards against DPPH radical ( Figure 3). Ethanol extracts showed the highest DPPH radical inhibitory activity; even though the standards inhibited best when compared with the extracts. With respect to the IC 50, ( Table 2) the inhibitory capacity of the standards and extracts were in the order: rutin > BHT > ethanol > aqueous > blanched > acetone.
